jobDescription: You have a hunger to succeed in a fast-paced environment. Interest in understanding our jobseekers, and care for empowering them in their career goals. Strong expertise in one or more of these areas: -Statistics, machine learning, information retrieval-Software engineering, algorithms, object-oriented design -Business objective definition and prioritization -Degree in computer science, statistics, mathematics, economics or related technical/quantitative field -3+ years of professional work experience (i.e. outside academia) -SQL experience is required-Experience developing in Java, Python or Ruby -Adept at algorithm design and selection -Clear communication skills Jobcase is the only social media site dedicated to empowering America's workforce. Available online and through an app, Jobcase provides one place to manage all things job-related, especially access to the knowledge, connections, and wisdom of over 75 million other Jobcasers.-We pay 100% of the cost of both your medical and dental premiums directly to the insurance companies -Establish an HSA to cover any out-of-pocket expenses you may incur that are not covered by the insurance -Employee parking/MBTA costs -Host lots of fun all-company events -Fully stocked kitchen
